com.soumen.weather.common

Interface BaseEAO<EntityType extends com.soumen.weather.common.BaseEntity>


  • public interface BaseEAO<EntityType extends com.soumen.weather.common.BaseEntity>
    Generic interface encouraging naming standards and providing common methods to Managers and a common implementation for those common items like CRUD and Finders.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntityType create(EntityType entity)
      Persists the entity given and returns the attached entity for more fun by managers.
      void delete(EntityType entity)
      Deletes the entity by finding using whatever means.

      EntityType get(EntityType entity)
      Provides the attached entity of what is likely not attached.

      Finds all the Entities for the type this EAO is managing.

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        void delete(java.lang.String uuid)
        Parameters:
        uuid - identifying what to delete

      • delete

        void delete(EntityType entity)
     throws javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException
        Deletes the entity by finding using whatever means.
        Parameters:
        entity - the attached or detached entity.
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when a detached entity cannot be found by any identifier
        See Also:
        get(BaseEntity)

      • getById

        EntityType getById(java.lang.String id)
            throws javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        id - the UUID of the attached entity
        Returns:
        the attached entity
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when entity is not found

      • get

        EntityType get(EntityType entity)
        throws javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException
        Provides the attached entity of what is likely not attached. This is useful because it will attempt to find the entity by other means than just the id (i.e. programName, etc)
        Parameters:
        entity - the fully filled unattached entity
        Returns:
        the attached entity
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when can't be found by any identifier

      • create

        EntityType create(EntityType entity)
           throws javax.ejb.DuplicateKeyException
        Persists the entity given and returns the attached entity for more fun by managers.
        Parameters:
        entity - to create fully populated
        Returns:
        the attached entity with the new id
        Throws:
        javax.ejb.DuplicateKeyException - same entity is available

      • merge

        EntityType merge(EntityType entity)
        Updates the entity. It will not create the entity so it will throw an exception if given and ID that is not found in the system.
        Parameters:
        entity - the attached entity, should be called after getting the entity.
        Returns:
        the attached entity or null

      • update

        EntityType update(EntityType entity)
           throws javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        entity - the attached entity, should be called after getting the entity.
        Returns:
        Update the attached entity
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when entity is not found

      • getAll

        java.util.List<EntityType> getAll()
        Finds all the Entities for the type this EAO is managing. Use wisely as this list can get large and there is no built-in limit to the number of results.
        Returns:
        Use wisely as this list can get large and there is no built-in limit to the number of results
